title: Rebbe's Aide's Son Arrested
body: A close aide to a prominent Yerushalayim Rebbe's son was arrested for deserting the IDF and transferred to a military prison, sparking tensions in the chareidi world.

title: Chareidi Teen Abused on Bus
body: A 17-year-old chareidi boy claims he was harassed and psychologically abused by an Arab bus driver on his way to Meron. Police closed the case without pursuing it, sparking outrage in Israel.
